menu_desc: Settings and functions for the quality of life mod
dialog_offshore_message: This will put all of your spending cash into offshore, this cannot be undone with this mod
toggle_noheat_desc: Disables the job heat penalty after doing the same heist multiple times in a row
button_cashToOffshore_desc: Transfer spending cash to offshore, handy to use before going infamous
button_forceReady_desc: Forces all players in the lobby to ready up and starts the heist
